title: Bulgarian Ambassador, MD APP discuss to expedite information linkage between official news agencies
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 6 (APP): Bulgarian Ambassador to Pakistan Ms Irena Gancheva on Thursday called on Managing Director Associated Press of Pakistan Muhammad Asim Khichi and discussed exchange of news and cooperation between two news agencies.
The Ambassador was keen to sign the news exchange agreement as earliest between Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) and Bulgarian Telegraph Agency (BTA).
Ambassador Irena Gancheva said its an era of information and technology and both the official news agencies should cooperate on exchange of mutual news and information.
She said communication linkages between two countries would pave way for future contacts including people to people, media, cultural, business, tourism, energy and others sectors for bringing two nations more closer.
Irena Gancheva said the two sides should strengthen exchanges and make joint efforts to enhance news cooperation.
Managing Director APP assured Bulgarian Ambassador that the signing agreement would be expedited to enhance news cooperation between two official news agencies and also expressed his willingness to deepen relations between two countries on multiple forum.
MD APP also presented a souvenir to Bulgarian Ambassador on her arrival to APP.
